meanings.definition: The quality or state of being able to be transported.
meanings.sent1: The transportabilities of the package made it easy to carry.
meanings.sent2: The transportabilities of the car allowed us to travel long distances.
meanings.sent3: The transportabilities of the suitcase made it the perfect choice for the trip.
meanings.sent4: Her transportabilities were like a magic power, enabling her to move swiftly.
meanings.sent5: The transportabilities of the boat were so impressive that it could sail through rough waters.

meanings.definition: The ability to be moved or conveyed from one place to another.
meanings.sent1: The transportabilities of the conveyor belt ensured smooth movement of goods.
meanings.sent2: The transportabilities of the train allowed passengers to reach their destination quickly.
meanings.sent3: The transportabilities of the shopping cart made grocery shopping a breeze.
meanings.sent4: His transportabilities were like those of a superhero, always ready to help others move.
meanings.sent5: The transportabilities of the drone were so advanced that it could deliver packages with precision.
